message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product. I think it would be a great fit for you. I'm asking for $20,000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $20,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $20,000 represents the value I see in this product, I understand your budget constraints. Could you meet me halfway at $15,000?
I appreciate the compromise, but $15,000 is still a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to consider that?
